ygData.subject: Re: Armours Trade
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t even have money to buy spells, how to buy armor ( Anyways, the xp here it quite easy to get, once we get bout 11-12 we can go desert of ro, i know of a
ygData.messageBody:
I don't even have money to buy spells, how to buy armor ( Anyways, the xp
here it quite easy to get, once we get bout 11-12 we can go desert of ro, i
know of a good hunting spot there without much danger. Zil, just send me a
tell the next time yer online, then i go pick u up )

Leshrec
-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 9:17 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Armours Trade


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>I want I want! Pl spick me up tonight and visit Freeport. I think we got
>more local kakis in Freeport and it will be nice to hunt with them instead
>of hunting with other players ;)
>
>As for the spells, Felwithe sell most of the lvl 3 spells at 4pp, only 1 or
>2 not so in demand selling at 3gp (I think lesser shield is 3pp+, it's
>pretty useful, dunno why only 3pp). As for shock of ice, firebolt, I buy
>both at 4pp+ each.
>
>Btw Les, did u fnd armor better than cloth for wiz in Freeport? What are u
>hunting in Freeport to gain lvl?
>
>On Tuesday, May 25, 1999 4:28 PM, Leshrec [SMTP:leshrec@...]
>wrote:
>> From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>>
>> I think wizs can wear better armor such as netted but i'm sure we can
>> wear woven but its damn ex.. BTW any of u elves in feltwithe or dwarves
>in
>> that area who wish to visit the fine town of freeport just send me a
>tell.
>> I'll go pick you up as soon as possible. )
>> And one more thing, Ziltus, could ya help me check on the price of
>> level 3 spells such as firebolt. The mages here are selling for 4 plat
>and
>> bout 8 silver.. Remembered they were going for bout 3 plats in Felwithe.
>>
>> Leshrec
>>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
>> Date: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 1:10 PM

>class

>> >>
>> >> Netted is just like Patch Work in terms of AC but with the weight
>of
>> >cloth. And it's magical, meaning that a Monk wearing the gloves will be
>> >able to hit wisp unlike the other class (eg warrior or paladin, paladin
>at
>> >lvl 15 get to cast a spell to summon a magic hammer, 1h bashing.)
